headlines.description: Richarlison scored twice and Alex Iwobi netted his first league goal to hand Everton a thrilling 3-2 win over Wolverhampton Wanderers.
headlines.shortLinkText: Richarlison bags brace as Everton edge Wolves

headlines.description: Arsenal fought back from two goals down to earn a point in a 2-2 draw against north London rivals Tottenham at the Emirates Stadium.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal fight back to hold Spurs in thrilling NLD
